description: Offcourse is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, passionate about transforming education and knowledge sharing. As an entrepreneur, thinker, and coder, he created the Superconnectors event format and founded the Innovator's Working Group of the Dutch Internet Society. Based in Taipei, Taiwan, he focuses on bringing people together around common values and translating shared visions into effective ecosystems. His work includes curating courses like "Align The Misaligned," which explores self-discovery and strategic planning for entrepreneurs, helping align personal attributes with business goals.
blurb: The journey to "Align The Misaligned" involves self-discovery and strategic planning. By identifying personal strengths, acknowledging weaknesses, analyzing your startup's position, and formulating a critical ask, you gain a comprehensive understanding of yourself and your business.
